sentence: Some  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians,  were  killed.

article_title: Israel and Hamas reach agreement on Gaza aid
sentence: The  Hamas  attacks  in  October  triggered  Israel's  intense  bombardment  of  Gaza,  which  has  killed  more  than  24,000  people  so  far,  most  of  them  women  and  children,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Israel and Hamas reach agreement on Gaza aid
sentence: Correction  13th  February:  This  article  wrongly  reported  that  about  1,300  people  had  been  killed  following  the  7th  October  attack  by  Hamas.
